patthana21.2:4.1: Nasahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.2:5.1: Nasahetukaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.2:5.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.2:6.1: Nasahetukaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.2:6.2: Naahetukaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.2:6.3: Nasahetukaṃ naabyākatañca naahetukaṃ naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.2:7.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.2:8.1: Nahetusampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā … pe … hetuyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana21.2:9.1: Nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana21.2:9.2: Nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nakusalo dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana21.2:9.3: Nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa kusalassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa kusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana21.2:10.1: Naahetuko ceva nana ca hetu nakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana21.2:11.1: Nahetu ceva naahetuko nakusalo ca naahetuko ceva nanahetu nakusalo ca dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana21.2:13.1: Nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana21.2:14.1: Nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naabyākato dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana21.2:14.5: Ārammaṇe adhipatiyā anantare samanantare upanissaye nava, kamme tīṇi, natthiyā vigate nava.
